About me

A passionate junior Machine Learning and Computer Vision Engineer with a Bachelor in Biomedical Engineering immersed in studying and working on AI technologies, from machine learning algorithms to neural networks.

My expertise lies in developing advanced algorithms for image and video analysis, object detection and segmentation.

View Resume

My Projects

Automatic analysis of cardiovascular MRI myocardial images

Implemented a Dense-UNet model combining features of Dense-Net and U-Net for binary semantic segmentation of the myocardium (portion of the heart).

The model achieved a dice coefficient score of 89% after fine-tunning and a geometrical assessment implemented for validating the output masks using Euler number and eccentricity.

See Live Source Code

Debiasing Facial Detection Systems

Implemented a convolutional neural network for facial classification, trained it on CelebA and ImageNet datasets and evaluated it across four demographics that differs in gender and skin tone.

Used variational autoencoders (VAEs) to adaptively resample the training dataset to mitigate potential biases against skin tone and gender and evaluated the performance of the debiased model against the baseline CNN model.

Improved the model’s accuracy of the most underestimated category (dark male) due to bias from 43% to 65% by utilizing the VAE model.

See Live Source Code
